scripts.build: VER=$(node -p 'require("./package.json").version') && pnpm exec esbuild src/index.ts --bundle --format=iife --platform=browser --target=es2019 --define:PACKAGE_VERSION=\"$VER\" --outfile=dist/Code.js --legal-comments=none && cp appsscript.json dist/appsscript.json
scripts.push: pnpm run build && pnpm exec clasp push
scripts.deploy: pnpm run build && pnpm exec clasp version "auto" && pnpm exec clasp deploy --description "deploy"
scripts.endpoint: DEPLOY_ID=$(pnpm exec clasp deployments | awk '/@[0-9]+/ {print $1}' | tail -n1) && echo https://script.google.com/macros/s/$DEPLOY_ID/exec
